description: This agreement is for the lease of a property between ayush and arsh.
nonNegotiableClauses: The lease term is from 1st jan 2025 to 1st dec 2025
The tenant must pay a monthly rent of ₹50000
The property shall be used exclusively for residential purposes.
Pets are not allowed on the premises.
Landlord has the right to enter the property in case of emergency
Tenant is responsible for keeping the property in good condition

deadlines.description: Payment of the first month's rent and security deposit
Payment of security deposit and first month's rent
Landlord and Tenant have to execute this Lease Agreement

termsAndConditions: The security deposit of ₹100000 will be refunded upon vacating the premises, subject to deductions for any damages or outstanding dues
The tenant must pay a monthly rent of ₹50000 on or before the 5th of each month
The Tenant agrees to maintain the property in good condition and promptly notify the Landlord of any necessary repairs.
The Tenant is responsible for minor repairs, while the Landlord handles major repairs unless damage is caused by the Tenant's negligence.
The Tenant is responsible for the payment of all utilities.
The Tenant shall not make any alterations or improvements to the property without the prior written consent of the Landlord.
Either party may terminate this Agreement by providing 30 days written notice to the other party.
Tenant will pay a security deposit
Tenant will pay rent on the first of every month
Landlord is responsible for maintaining the structure of the building
Tenant is responsible for paying utilities
